PendingResult<ContainerHolder> loadContainerDefaultOnly(String containerId, int defaultContainerResourceId, Handler handler) The ContainerHolder will be available from the returned PendingResult as soon as either of the following happens: the default container is loaded, or no default container is found.

PendingResult<ContainerHolder> loadContainerDefaultOnly(String containerId, int defaultContainerResourceId) The ContainerHolder will be available from the returned PendingResult as soon as either of the following happens: the default container is loaded, or no default container is found.

PendingResult<ContainerHolder> loadContainerPreferFresh(String containerId, int defaultContainerResourceId) The ContainerHolder will be available from the returned PendingResult as soon as one of the following happens: a saved container which has been recently refreshed is loaded, a network container is loaded or a network error occurs, or a timeout occurs (as specified in await(long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit), or setResultCallback(com.google.android.gms.common.api.ResultCallback, long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit).

PendingResult<ContainerHolder> loadContainerPreferFresh(String containerId, int defaultContainerResourceId, Handler handler) The ContainerHolder will be available from the returned PendingResult as soon as one of the following happens: a saved container which has been recently refreshed is loaded, a network container is loaded or a network error occurs, or a timeout occurs (as specified in await(long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit), or setResultCallback(com.google.android.gms.common.api.ResultCallback, long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit).

PendingResult<ContainerHolder> loadContainerPreferNonDefault(String containerId, int defaultContainerResourceId) The ContainerHolder will be available from the returned PendingResult as soon as one of the following happens: a saved container is loaded, or if there is no saved container, a network container is loaded or a network error occurs, or a timeout occurs (as specified in await(long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit), or setResultCallback(com.google.android.gms.common.api.ResultCallback, long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit).
